text:
Tysabri had US sales of $1.12 billion in 2022, 14.1% of $BIIB's revenue and down slightly from $1.14 billion in 2021, according to data compiled by Bloomberg LP.

Biogen cited 4 of case’s 17 patents in support of its 1/20 request. Said it “will be irreparably harmed” if denied.
author: Christopher Yasiejko

text: Looks like $ions has solved the BBB issue. Looks like $ions and $dnli worked on this. $arwr $biib

text:
A $BIIB spokesperson acknowledged the ruling in a statement Thursday but said Biogen “cannot comment on our legal strategy or speculate on the outcome of the litigation.”

@Sandoz_Global is “assessing the decision,” a spokesperson for the $NOVN unit said.
author: Christopher Yasiejko
